summary.Title: Mobile Ticket Sellers
summary.Presentation: Stromma Denmark is currently looking for mobile sellers for the 2022 season. We are one of Denmark's largest providers within the tourism industry. You know us from Canal Tours, Copenhagen

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Stromma Denmark is currently looking for mobile sellers for the 2022 season. We are one of Denmark's largest providers within the tourism industry. You know us from Canal Tours, Copenhagen Panorama Excursions and the Hop On Hop Off buses, Copenhagen City Sightseeing and Copenhagen Train Tours.

As an employee of Stromma Danmark, your most important task is to greet the almost one million guests we welcome every year. You have the direct contact with our guests and therefore it is important that you can sell our products - and slightly more! When you do this and at the same time give the guests Memories for life, you have achieved success in your job!

You will be presenting and sell Stromma’s products from several locations in Copenhagen during your working day and are therefore comfortable with a dynamic working environment. You will be part of a workplace with great colleagues who are all contributing with a good and efficient collaboration across the organisation.

You can:

  • Speak English and may also have good language skills in Danish, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese or Japanese
  • Work outdoors in all kinds of weather
  • Sell tickets for our various sightseeing tours by bus, boat or train
  • Inform and guide in the 'right' way - and preferably with that 'little extra'
  • Be motivated by a job that is measurable and find joy in winning and competing
  • Stay focused on giving the guests good service on a busy and sometimes hectic working day
  • Unite with Stromma’s values: Reliable, Engaged and Genuine
  • Give Stromma’s guests an experience that aligns with 'Memories for life'
  • Work independently and be a good team player
  • Stay happy, smile, be positive and have the courage for great activity and many guests
  • Be outreach and meet our guests at eye level with a smile

Requirements:

  • You must be 18 years of age and have a clean criminal record
  • You can present a valid residence / work permit in Denmark

We offer you:

  • Employment on an hourly basis (opening hours 08: 00 - 21: 00) and basically seasonal from May to September, but with the option of permanent employment for the best sales people
  • Own influence on the number of hours / shifts
  • A job in Denmark's capital in inner Copenhagen and the largest Nordic provider of sightseeing experiences
  • Development of your skills in sales, communication, service, and language
  • A job in an international group and insight into experience economics
  • Ongoing competitions and social events
  • Daily meeting with happy and expectant guests from all over the world
  • A free work environment with unity and happy colleagues
  • Access to free coffee / tea

We will invite for interviews in the coming months with job start late April 2022.

In case of questions please contact Sales Team Manager René Loffredo at rene.loffredo@stromma.dk
